page.title: 19FAMILY LIFE IN WEST STROUD
page.content:
Most people live in stone houses with an average of seven rooms. Most houses have at least 3 bedrooms, a kitchen, a living room, a bathroom and an indoor toilet. Most houses have a garden. Most houses have electricity or gas and running hot and cold water inside.
Most families have, electric or gas cookers, washing machines, televisions, telephones, radios, sewing machines, vacumn cleaners, refrigerators, irons and electric kettles. Most families have comfortable furniture and carpeted floors. Some families have dishwashers, microwaves, tumble driers, freezers, computers, hi-fi's, videos and food processors.
